pages.text: The $(thing)ME System$() uses a unique form of power measured in $(thing)AE$().$(br2)Some $(item)External Power Systems$() can be converted into $(thing)AE$(), but this conversion only works 1-way. $(thing)AE2$() is not a power conversion mod.$(br2)What $(item)External Power Systems$() are available depends on your particular modpack setup.
